meanings.definition: A drink made of beer mixed with lemonade or ginger beer.
meanings.sent1: At the picnic, everyone enjoyed sipping on refreshing shandygaffs.
meanings.sent2: The pub down the street serves the best shandygaffs in town.
meanings.sent3: The party was a hit with plenty of shandygaffs flowing all night long.
meanings.sent4: The combination of beer and lemonade in shandygaffs creates a unique flavor.
meanings.sent5: The fizzy shandygaffs quenched my thirst on a hot summer day.
